channel.title: Miscellaneous on Edge Compute Live
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous on Edge Compute Live

item.title: Autocomplete
item.description: Serves responses for popular search terms at the Edge. Autocomplete requests are typically long tail and frequently changing. Without an EdgeWorker, it is difficult to get up-to-date content from cache. Storing and serving the most popular search terms from the Edge will speed up responses significantly.
